snippet: Visitors may view a cat cafe as a sort of indoor playspace for cat-loving adults, but the intent at Cat Town Cafe in California is serious.
abstract: Cat Town Cafe & Adoption Center in Oakland, Calif, is first permanent cat care in United States; customers have adopted 52 cats so far; it costs $10 an hour to play with cats.
lead_paragraph: Visitors may view a cat cafe as a sort of indoor playspace for cat-loving adults, but the intent at Cat Town Cafe in California is serious.

headline.main: To Spur Adoptions, an Oakland Cafe Puts Cats Among the Patrons
headline.print_headline: To Spur Adoptions, a Cafe Puts Cats Among the Patrons

keywords.value: Cat Town Cafe & Adoption Center (Oakland, Calif)
